ui

Class UserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.UserInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UIFacade

    public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements UIFacade
    A text-based user interface to interact with the system.

      • showPendingOrders

        public void showPendingOrders(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> pendingOrders)
        Show the user his pending orders.
        Specified by:
        showPendingOrders in interface UIFacade
        Parameters:
        pendingOrders - An ArrayList of Strings. Each String in this ArrayList represents an order. It contains the quantity, the name of the model and the estimated time, all separated by comma's.

      • showCompletedOrders

        public void showCompletedOrders(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> completedOrders)
        Show the user's completed orders.
        Specified by:
        showCompletedOrders in interface UIFacade
        Parameters:
        pendingOrders - An ArrayList of Strings. Each String in this ArrayList represents an order. It contains the quantity and the name of the model, separated by comma's.

      • showOrder

        public void showOrder(int quantity,
             java.lang.String model,
             int[] estimatedTime)
        Show the user the order he is about to place.
        Specified by:
        showOrder in interface UIFacade
        Parameters:
        quantity - An integer representing the quantity of cars the user is about to order.
        carModel - A String representing the name of the carmodel the user is about to order.
        estimatedTime - The estimated completion time, represented by two integers: the day and the time (in minutes). If the estimated completion time == -1, the completion time can't be shown.

      • showWorkBenchCompleted

        public void showWorkBenchCompleted()
        Notify the user that all the tasks at the workbench he's working on are completed.
        Specified by:

      • showAssemblyLine

        public void showAssemblyLine(java.lang.String assemblyline,
                    java.lang.String tense)
        Show the user the assemblyline.
        Specified by:
        showAssemblyLine in interface UIFacade
        Parameters:
        assemblyline - A String representing the assemblyline. The String contains all the workbenches in the assemblyline and all the tasks at each workbench (with indication whether the task has been completed), each of them separated by a comma.
        tense - String that indicates whether the other parameter is a current or future assemblyline.

      • showChosenTask

        public void showChosenTask(java.lang.String task)
        Show the user the task he has chosen.
        Specified by:
        showChosenTask in interface UIFacade
        Parameters:
        task - A String that represents the task. This String contains the task description, "Required actions:", and all the actions required. Each of these elements are separated by a comma.

      • showBlockingBenches

        public void showBlockingBenches(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> notCompletedBenches)
        Show the user which benches are keeping the assemblyline from advancing.
        Specified by:
        showBlockingBenches in interface UIFacade
        Parameters:
        notCompletedBenches - A list of integers. Each integer represents the number of a workbench that is blocking the assemblyline.

      • chooseWorkBench

        public int chooseWorkBench(int numberOfWorkBenches,
                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> workbenches)
        returns the number of the workbench at which the user is currently residing
        Specified by:
        chooseWorkBench in interface UIFacade
        Parameters:
        The - amount of workbenches in the assemblyline this is necessary to validate the user input
        Returns:
        A strictly positive integer. The integer 'n' that is returned indicates the user chooses the n'th element in the given list.

      • chooseTask

        public int chooseTask(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tasks)
        the user indicates which tasks he wants to perform
        Specified by:
        chooseTask in interface UIFacade
        Parameters:
        The - tasks at the user's current workbench
        Returns:
        A strictly positive integer. The integer 'n' that is returned indicates the user chooses the n'th element in the given list.

        Specified by:
        chooseModel in interface UIFacade
        Parameters:
        catalogue - A Set which contains Strings that represent the names of all possible car models that can be ordered.
